snippet: Although prices vary widely across the nation, cellular phone service appears to be least expensive in the East and most expensive in California, according to a new survey by the International Data Corporation....
lead_paragraph: Although prices vary widely across the nation, cellular phone service appears to be least expensive in the East and most expensive in California, according to a new survey by the International Data Corporation.
abstract: International Data Corp reports that cellular phone serve appears to be least expensive in the East and most expensive in California (S)

headline.main: Cellular Service Cheaper In East, a Survey Says
